law.history: Repealed 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 28. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 1. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 6. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 85, secs. 1, 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2243.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: When judge to draw jury lists from drum; number drawn; procedure; panels to be selected from lists.
